page.title: 01Summary of Ponteland Area
page.content: {The Village of Ponteland}lies in the South West corner of the area and lies on the main trunk road A696 from Newcastle upon Tyne to Scotland.It is 8 miles from the city centre.The majority of residents live in Local Authority housing.There are also small private housing areas.There is a small modern shopping centre,a library and health centre with seven Doctors and a Dentist in attendance.A Middle School and a First School cater for the children of the area.The{River Pont flows through the western edge of the area from South to North and dominates the centre of Ponteland as it flows under the stone road bridge.The{Rifle {Range}is owned by the Ministry of Defence and covers 500 acres of land much of it is wetland.The non wetland is used by a local farmer for grazing.No shooting happens on Friday.
